response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This product, which I believe you will find unparalleled in its quality and utility, is priced at $1,200,000. My goal is to ensure that we reach a mutually beneficial agreement that respects the significant worth this item has to both myself and you. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
